welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kanmaki, Japan! Known for its breathtaking natural beauty and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to immerse yourself in our charming city and discover all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by Peach Aviation and Spring Airlines Japan.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'ITM Free Wi-Fi' on their device and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kobe Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
